issue.title: [CF 31] Buffs equivalence
issue.body:
Actually i'm using TellMeWhen for procs, cds and as a buff reminder.

for example I use 1 of tellmewhen's windows to show on my paladin when BOK is missing... If Mark of the Wild is already active on me, tellmewhen will show that i'm missing BOK, but i can't cast it 'cause the same buff is active...

I hope to let you understand what i mean. The same happens with fortitude, horn of winter, hunter's pet new buffs... and so on.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #31 | Raw

comments.body:
In the spell selection dialog, select "Increased Stats" from the dropdown menu. Make sure that you are updated to 1.5.2 or this menu won't exist for you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Oh, I think I understand now. I accidentally excluded kings from the increased stats buff equivalancy. Fixed in the next version.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
